required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics Study of TQB3702 Tablets in Hematologic Tumor Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Clinical Trial of Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of TQB3702 Tablets in Hematologic Tumor Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This project is an open, dose escalation and expansion phase I clinical study. The first phase is a dose escalation study, and the second phase is a dose expansion study based on the Maximum tolerated dose (MTD) / Recommended Phase II Dose (RP2D) obtained in the first phase. The purpose is to evaluate the tolerability and preliminary efficacy of TQB3702 tablets in hematological tumor subjects.

primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the maximum tolerated dose of TQB3702 tablets in the treatment of relapsed/refractory hematologic tumors.
To evaluate the dose-limiting toxic dose of TQB3702 tablets in the treatment of relapsed/refractory hematologic tumors.
To evaluate the phase II recommended dose of TQB3702 tablets in the treatment of relapsed/refractory hematological tumors.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration (Tmax)-single dose
secondary_outcome.description: Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration after single dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration (Tmax)-multiple dose
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before administration (-1~0h), 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 24 hours after administration at Day 8/15/28 of Cycle1, Day 28 of Cycle 6; when withdrawn from the group due to disease progression or at the end of study treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration after multiple dose
Cmax is the maximum plasma concentration of TQB3702 after single dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before administration (-1~0h), 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 24 hours after administration at Day 8/15/28 of Cycle1, Day 28 of Cycle 6; when withdrawn from the group due to disease progression or at the end of study treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax is the maximum plasma concentration of TQB3702 after multiple dose
t1/2 is time it takes for the blood concentration of TQB3702 or metabolite(s) to drop by half after single dose.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before administration (-1~0h), 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 24 hours after administration at Day 8/15/28 of Cycle1, Day 28 of Cycle 6; when withdrawn from the group due to disease progression or at the end of study treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: t1/2 is time it takes for the blood concentration of TQB3702 or metabolite(s) to drop by half after multiple dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to time t (AUC0-t)-Single dose
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of TQB3702 by assessment of area under the plasma concentration time curve from the first dose to a certain time.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to time t (AUC0-t)-Multiple dose
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before administration (-1~0h), 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 24 hours after administration at Day 8/15/28 of Cycle1, Day 28 of Cycle 6; when withdrawn from the group due to disease progression or at the end of study treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of TQB3702 by assessment of area under the plasma concentration time curve from the first dose to a certain time.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum (peak) steady-state plasma drug concentration during a dosage interval (Cmax,ss)-Single dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum (peak) steady-state plasma drug concentration during a dosage interval (Cmax,ss)-Multiple dose

secondary_outcome.description: Maximum (peak) steady-state plasma drug concentration during a dosage interval (Cmax,ss) after Multiple dose

secondary_outcome.measure: steady state area under the concentration-time curve over a dosing interval (AUCtau, ss)-single dose
secondary_outcome.description: steady state area under the concentration-time curve over a dosing interval (AUCtau, ss) after single dose

secondary_outcome.measure: steady state area under the concentration-time curve over a dosing interval (AUCtau, ss)-multiple dose
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before administration (-1~0h), 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 24 hours after administration at Day 8/15/28 of Cycle1, Day 28 of Cycle 6; when withdrawn from the group due to disease progression or at the end of study treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Minimum steady-state plasma drug concentration during a dosage interval (Css-min)-Single dose
secondary_outcome.description: Minimum steady-state plasma drug concentration during a dosage interval (Cmin-ss) after Single dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Minimum steady-state plasma drug concentration during a dosage interval (Css-min)-multiple dose
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before administration (-1~0h), 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 24 hours after administration at Day 8/15/28 of Cycle1, Day 28 of Cycle 6; when withdrawn from the group due to disease progression or at the end of study treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: Minimum steady-state plasma drug concentration during a dosage interval (Cmin-ss) after multiple dose
The proportion of patients with tumor size reduction of a predefined amount and for a minimum time period
The proportion of tumors that have a complete response after treatment
The percentage of patients with advanced or metastatic cancer who have achieved complete response, partial response and stable disease to a cancer treatment in clinical trials.
The time from the date of first documentation of a CR or PR or PD to the date of first documentation of tumor progression.
The time from the first dose to the first documentation of progressive disease (PD) or death from any cause, whichever occurs first
the time from start of study treatment to date of death due to any cause
The occurrence of all adverse events (AE)
The occurrence of all serious adverse events (SAE)
The BTK occupancy in peripheral blood mononuclear cell (PMBC)

arm_group.description: TQB3702 tablets were administered orally, 28 days as a treatment cycle until the progressive diseases or the investigator judges that it is not suitable for subject to continue to take this medicine.

intervention.description: TQB3702 tablets are selective BTK inhibitors.

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of Nanchang University
The Cancer Hospital Affiliated to Shandong First Medical University
